## \_add() function

Add a value to the start of an array without mutating it.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function _add<T>(array: Maybe<ImmutableArray<T>>, value: Immutable<T>): Immutable<T>[];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  array | Maybe&lt;ImmutableArray&lt;T&gt;&gt; |  |
|  value | Immutable&lt;T&gt; |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Immutable&lt;T&gt;\[\]
